Name: Lexzel
description:
Lexzel is 37 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by farming seaweed in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 35,000 through NWTF to purchase additional seaweed seedlings to farm and other materials for her business.

She has been in this business for seven years and also earns additional income from fishing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.
